annotations.description: In this episode of How to Drink, I’m making an original of mine that I came up with called the Gin Whisper. It’s a shaken combination of gin, egg whites, St....
annotations.title: Gin Whisper | How to Drink

textContent:
2oz Gin
.25oz Simple Syrup
.25oz St. Germain
3 Mint Leaves
1 Egg white

Dry Shake
Wet Shake Vigorously
Double Strain
Garnish with Mint leaf

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=rO3zlIPJTYI&t=62s
title: Gin Whisper
